commitResults.messageTitle: Implement a skeletal version of Duke that starts by greeting the user and simply echos the commands entered by the user, and exits when the user types bye.
Add the ability to store whatever text entered by the user and display them back to the user when requested.
Add Task class to represent Tasks in the Duke bot.
commitResults.messageBody: Using a Task class and correspondingly Task objects to represent Tasks is a more natural way of representing tasks and allows me to keep the logic for the Task representation in a class of itself.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add the ability to change the status of tasks
commitResults.messageBody: We can mark tasks as done and change the status of the tasks back to not done.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add different types of events namely Deadlines, Events and Todos and Modify Task field's access markers
commitResults.messageBody: Deadline, Events and Todos are all types of Tasks and we make use to inheritance to share code. We also modify the access marker of the Task's fields so as to allow the fields to be accessible from the subclasses we created.
Made use of Polymorphism to modify the String representations of different tasks.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add support for tracking the three new types of Tasks in Dukebot
commitResults.messageBody: Made use of Polymorphism to ensure correct outputs are printed to the screen.

commitResults.messageTitle: Use the Input/Output redirection technique to semi-automate the testing of Duke
commitResults.messageBody: Add the inputs and expected outputs.

commitResults.messageTitle: Teach Duke to handle errors as incorrect inputs entered by the user using Exceptions
Teach Duke to deal with errors associated with incorrect inputs from the user
commitResults.messageBody: Made use of Exceptions and Polymorphism to handle Event task, Deadline task, Todo task, Task and incorrect command exceptions.

commitResults.messageTitle: Modify I/O Redirection Testing to handle new exceptions used to handle errors
Add support for deleting tasks from the list
Add test case coverage for Deletion
Add error handling for mark, unmark and delete commands and test coverage for mark, unmark and delete commands
Add JavaDoc comments for all files
